issue.title: we want to use nbviewer for presentation
issue.body: 我们想利用jupyter notebook nbviewer进行展示。出于美观考虑，请问如何将nbviewer上的图片或是表格居中？

issue.title: No error, but the pyecharts map can't display
issue.body:
# Troubleshooting
## Describe your environment
* Operating system:
* Python version:
* Hardware:
* Internet access:
* Jupyter notebook or not? [Y/N]:Y


<!-- Texts appear in angle brackets like this are comments and will not show in your issue body. They are here to help you fill in this form. Feel free to remove those comments. You can also remove other texts that is irrelevant to your issue -->

## Describe your question
No error, but the pyecharts map can't display.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42838093/49517940-58214580-f8d8-11e8-8cec-03eac0df5030.png)
I have already install the maps.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42838093/49518019-8dc62e80-f8d8-11e8-8f6c-b0360d6456e1.png)

## The minimum code (snippet) to reproduce the issue
import pyecharts
from pyecharts import Map
value = [5, 2, 2, 2, 1, 1, 1, 5, 5]
attr = ["深圳", "广州", "杭州", "成都", "南京", "厦门", "武汉", "北京", "上海"]  
map = Map("Map 结合 VisualMap 示例", width=1200, height=600)
map.add(
    "",
    attr,
    value,
    maptype="china",
    is_visualmap=True,
    visual_text_color="#000",
)
map.render()
map
Example:

```python
open('path-to-a-file-not-exist')
```

<!-- If you have big project hard to summarise, please upload it onto GitHub and put link here -->

## Describe the efforts you have spent on this issue

Example:

### Have you Google/ Stackover flow anything?

### Do they solve or partially solve your question?

### What is the closest answer you can find?

comment.body:
the same problem happened in our project too. cannot display our word cloud even we changed blower and cleaned cache.
![Uploading 屏幕快照 2018-12-06 11.23.30.png…]()

issue.title: I want to enrich my data.
issue.body:
# Troubleshooting


I want to enrich my data. It seems that I have to click every single webpage in the first column "work name" to find more information to support my story.

https://archiveofourown.org/media/Movies/fandoms

Beside, as using this method I mentioned，I have trouble in finding kudos. 

================
现有的思路：
写两个爬虫，把两个爬虫都设置成函数

第一个爬虫收集https://archiveofourown.org/media/Movies/fandoms页面下的 书名  超链接 文章数
eg：
![37771542968747_ pic](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42727192/48939740-3c20ba00-ef50-11e8-9707-462de95139a3.jpg)

按照文章数量从高到低选出前100栏，生成第一个csv 1

第二个爬虫：提取出超链接这一栏，通过try函数，抓取这100个页面里第一页（20篇）的 words , hits

（第二个爬虫的csv有对应问题，因为一个原作名字要对应很多个文章名字）

issue.title: I want to enrich my data.
issue.body:
# Troubleshooting


I want to enrich my data. It seems that I have to click every single webpage in the first column "work name" to find more information to support my story.

https://archiveofourown.org/media/Movies/fandoms

Beside, as using this method I mentioned，I have trouble in finding kudos. 

================
现有的思路：
写两个爬虫，把两个爬虫都设置成函数

第一个爬虫收集https://archiveofourown.org/media/Movies/fandoms页面下的 书名  超链接 文章数
eg：
![37771542968747_ pic](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42727192/48939740-3c20ba00-ef50-11e8-9707-462de95139a3.jpg)

按照文章数量从高到低选出前100栏，生成第一个csv 1

第二个爬虫：提取出超链接这一栏，通过try函数，抓取这100个页面里第一页（20篇）的 words , hits

comment.body: 就是每个links后有新的页面，比如我想找到某部电影下属的所有文章（扫第一页） 圆圈圈住的部分 但是考虑到热门电影往往有很多文章，第一页默认显示为20篇，数据量太多，就只准备找前100个热门电影的页面（按电影名称末尾的文章数目选定前100）

issue.title: I want to enrich my data.
issue.body:
# Troubleshooting


I want to enrich my data. It seems that I have to click every single webpage in the first column "work name" to find more information to support my story.Is there any easier way?

https://archiveofourown.org/media/Movies/fandoms

The columns of the data that I want to scrap in is as below:

![37361542897837_ pic](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42727192/48934071-96644f80-ef3d-11e8-955c-667c2783b492.jpg)

Is there any easier way?

Beside, as using this method I mentioned，I have trouble in finding kudos.

issue.title: I cannot find required number in the tag.
issue.body: * Operating system:Mac os * Python version:py3 * Hardware:mac pro * Internet access:wifi * Jupyter notebook or not? [Y/N]:y * Which chapter of book?:5 I cannot find required number in the tag. My dataset is about to scrape the top20 popular original works in main media genres on the AO3(https://archiveofourown.org/media). The number of fan work cannot to be scraped since it is not in the tag. data fields are as bellows genre - String. e.g.Anime & Manga fanwork number - Int.e.g.36 original works name - String.e.g Haikyuu!! my code is as bellows: import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup r = requests.get('https://archiveofourown.org/media') html_str = r.text #get the content of the request data = BeautifulSoup(html_str,"html.parser") my_h1 = data.find('h1') # 查找网页主页标题 my_title = my_h1.text print(my_title.strip()) my_h2 = data.find('h2') # 查找网页主页副标题 my_title2 = my_h2.text print(my_title2.strip()) my_bookname=data.find_all('a')#查找各书名 for tag in my_bookname: print (tag.text) headers = ['bookname','num'] from csv import* import csv with open('list.csv','w',newline='')as f: f_csv=csv.writer(f) if(headers): f_csv.writerow(headers) if(tag.text): f_csv.writerows(tag.text) ## Describe the efforts you have spent on this issue This is the structure of Douban and the number of viewers is in the tag. ![wechatimg1866](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42727192/48042753-12c90580-e1be-11e8-884b-c42d3322797b.png) I don't know if it is the problem of ao3 or I just get it wrong.hope you can help me.Thank you!

comment.body: thank you!code runs smoothly but there is another small problem. some book name is Japanese so when I look up to the csv file it will become an error code. it is because that the encode form different from Chinese?
